features: Soothes and Moisturizes: Hydrating face cleanser specially formulated for men to thoroughly clean and refresh skin
Deeply Cleanses: This lightly scented aloe vera face wash gently foams while deeply cleansing to remove dirt and oil
Protects from Drying Out: This NIVEA face wash for men protects skin from drying out and doesn't leave skin feeling tight or dry
Aloe Vera and Provitamin B5 Enriched: NIVEA MEN hydrating face wash enriched with Aloe Vera, Provitamin B5 and other moisturizers
Includes one (1) 5 fluid ounce tube of NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Moisturizing Face Wash with Aloe Vera
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Moisturizing Face Wash. This daily face wash is specially formulated for men to thoroughly cleanse and hydrate skin. NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration face wash for dry skin is formulated with Aloe Vera, Provitamin B5 and other moisturizers to leave skin feeling clean and moisturized after cleansing. Featuring a light, fresh scent this NIVEA for men face wash gently foams while deeply cleansing to remove excess dirt and oils. You can feel good about using this deep cleansing face wash since it protects skin from drying out and doesn't leave skin feeling tight or dry after use. This NIVEA MEN face wash leaves skin feeling healthy and cared for. A daily facial cleanser is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Shave Gel, Post Shave Balm and Face Moisturizer. To use, lather this NIVEA MEN's face wash, massage over wet face, and rinse off with water.

Has the formula of NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Moisturizing Face Wash changed? The formula of NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Moisturizing Face Wash has not changed, but the product has new packaging. Is this face scrub fragrance-free? NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Moisturizing Face Wash has a light fragrance. It is free of phthalates and silicones. How do you apply this product and how often? Apply a small amount to a wet face and massage, gently avoiding the eye area, then rinse off thoroughly. Use this face wash daily. For the best results, follow up with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Protective Lotion. Does this face wash create a foam when you lather it up?​ Yes, NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Face Wash creates a gentle foam when massaged onto a wet face/neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshness at the best
reviews.reviewText: Its gentle formula leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or irritation. The subtle fragrance is a nice touch, making my skincare routine a pleasant experience. I've noticed a positive difference in my skin's glow since using this product. i like the smell as well. Overall, it's a reliable face wash that I can count on for a simple and effective cleanse every day. Nivea products are always trustworthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Smells wonderful and leaves your face feeling great. It just doesn't last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product - Terrible Packaging
reviews.reviewText: As many other reviews have stated, there is a major flaw in the cap design. I purchased 2 of these face washes at the same time and both arrived broken where the center peg on the inside of the cap had broken off and became stuck in the dispensing hole. Using a knife carefully was the only way I could get them unplugged. I even tried to glue the center pegs back on but that failed.Aside from that, the face wash is good - reasonably priced and does a good job. It could be a bit more moisturizing for me but that could simply be my skin type. Neutrogena makes a similar product that I will be switching to since their packaging is much better and I can effectively store them and use them without issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Basic Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I've come to like this facewash. It has a nice masculine scent, doesn't dry out my skin like regular soap and you only need to use a dime sized amount for a face and neck wash. I've noticed after several weeks of using this soap that my skin is clearer and doesn't break out anymore. Every morning I use this facewash and then apply my moisturizer with sunscreen. Keeps me looking younger than I am! Plus, you can't beat the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is the best product for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my husband who was having issues with dry skin. He's been using it for a month now and says he's definitely noticed a change in his skin. I'll continue to purchase this for him so long as he's impressed with the results. If you have a husband with the same issue, I'd give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: By far the best mens face wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grab you some fellas
reviews.reviewText: No complaints with this stuff. Good smell and leaves my face feeling fresh. Doesn’t take a whole lot either. A little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo único malo es la fragancia.
reviews.reviewText: Buen producto, lástima de fragancia tan intensa, hace corto circuito con una buena loción. La versión Sensitive no tiene ese problema.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nivea men i have using for past 8 months
reviews.reviewText: It removes pimples, scars to width ratios, dark black spots,.it improves glow skin

reviews.reviewTitle: ... works really well on my face with menthol its good.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for long time now and it works really well on my face with menthol its good.
Nice smell, nice texture.Bottle is kinda small.Price is a little too high for my taste.A little irritating if you have sensitive skin.Good quality otherwise.
